title: Pump-Action shotgun Character Animation Pack
description: A set a animations for the pump-action shotgun, a demo blueprint setup and weapons included.
longDescription:
This is pack of animations for the pump-action shotgun, these animations can be used in a first and third person modes. In the demo map you will find a demo setup for how you would combine the various animations to do a reload based on what ammo is left inside the shotgun and available ammo in your inventory, the setup also play animations on the shotgun mesh to give more life to the animation.


Video demo


Some interesting animations are included like physically checking the ammo inside the shotgun mag, and another animation for checking if there's a shell inside the chamber.


The included shotgun is rigged and ready for animation.
technicalDetails:
Features: 


Realistic animations with attention to details

 Shotgun rigged and can be animated (some animations included)

 Multiple montages with notifies

Character Blueprint setup

Rigged to Epic skeleton: Yes

If rigged to the Epic skeleton, IK bones are included: Yes

Number of Animations:

  • Character: 39 animations + 12 montages
  • Shotgun: 8 animations + 7 montages

Animation types: In-place

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Documentation: Email Support

Important/Additional Notes:
